类的使用
org.springframework.web.servlet.support.RequestContext

  • 使用RequestContext的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.servlet.support
    Support classes for Spring's web MVC framework.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.tags
    This package contains Spring's JSP standard tag library for JSP 2.0+.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.view
    Provides standard View and ViewResolver implementations, including abstract base classes for custom implementations.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.support中RequestContext的使用

      org.springframework.web.servlet.support中RequestContext的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  JspAwareRequestContext
      JSP-aware (and JSTL-aware) subclass of RequestContext, allowing for population of the context from a javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext.
      参数类型为RequestContext的org.springframework.web.servlet.support中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void JstlUtils.exposeLocalizationContext(RequestContext requestContext)
      Exposes JSTL-specific request attributes specifying locale and resource bundle for JSTL's formatting and message tags, using Spring's locale and MessageSource.
      参数类型为RequestContext的org.springframework.web.servlet.support中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BindStatus(RequestContext requestContext, String path, boolean htmlEscape)
      Create a new BindStatus instance, representing a field or object status.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.tags中RequestContext的使用

      返回RequestContext的org.springframework.web.servlet.tags中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected RequestContext RequestContextAwareTag.getRequestContext()
      Return the current RequestContext.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.view中RequestContext的使用

      返回RequestContext的org.springframework.web.servlet.view中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected RequestContext AbstractView.createRequestContext(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Map<String,Object> model)
      Create a RequestContext to expose under the specified attribute name.
